description:
Located in New York, New York, the law firm of Dalton & Associates, P.A., offers unmatched counsel and support to clients across the greater New York City metro area and beyond who suffered a serious injury or illness due to toxic exposure or as the result of an accident caused by someone else's negligence or wrongdoing. With an additional office in Wilmington, Delaware, we have become one our region's leading law firms for those with legal needs involving any of the following:

  • Medical malpractice
  • Asbestos exposure and mesothelioma
  • Dangerous and defective products
  • Talcum powder litigation
  • Sexual abuse litigation
  • Other personal injury claims
  • Civil rights litigation
  • Business litigation
  • White collar criminal defense

Our law firm's team of top-ranked, dedicated legal advocates possesses decades of combined legal experience. During our time in practice, we have achieved remarkable success fighting for the rights and entitlements of innocent injury victims and their families throughout New York, New Jersey, Pennsylvania and Delaware as well as in various jurisdictions across the country. This means you can expect to receive the highest level of representation directly from a local attorney who has your best interests at heart.

In honor for our remarkable professionalism and outstanding client service, our lawyers have earned consistent recognition from The Best Lawyers in America, including the organization's Lawyer of the Year award, and Delaware Today has voted us among the state's Top Medical Malpractice Lawyers each year since 1998. Our lawyers have also received many other accolades and endorsements from our peers, and our law firm has enjoyed many testimonials and referrals from those we have served.

To begin the process of obtaining the justice you deserve for your unfortunate and avoidable tragedy, you can contact Dalton & Associates, P.A., to schedule a consultation. In these uncertain times, we also offer virtual consultations in an attempt to keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy.
